description: A Moderate 6 km trail that leads to a small cabine with a return time of 3 hours. The route takes you to a small cabin maintained by the Kitimat Snowmobile Club.  The cabin has a registration book that you are welcome to sign.
directions: From the Kitimat Service Centre head north along Enterprise Avenue until you reach the Wedeene Forest Service Road. Continue north along the road for approximately 1 km, then turn left and follow the side road for approximately 2 km to the trailhead (in summer time) or park your car there (winter time)
title: Mount Claque Cabine
